Subject: Re: Gravity Forms Captcha error

[EXTERNAL] This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.

Hi Lucy,

We have implemented another option instead of Captcha called a Honey Pot.

It’s working better with the having the forms in the popups, so let’s monitor it over the next few days.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

From: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt
Sent: Wednesday, 2 June 2021 3:47 PM
To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Subject: Gravity Forms Captcha error
Importance: High

Hey Heath,

Daryl has picked up that some of the Captchas on our forms aren’t loading/ working, which is disabling the ability for people to submit forms…

I’ve noticed this across some products as well as the Contact Us page:

<image002.png>

What do you think is going on here?

From looking at the backend forms it would appear that this function has been down from around the 21st May, or maybe even as early as the 17th?

Could you take a look and fix ASAP as worried we cant be contacted.

Thanks Heath.

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
